\[Δ\_μ, λ\].definition: Commutator of μ-weighted Laplacian with λ (curvature/mode-deformation).
\[Δ\_μ, λ\].condition: λ must act linearly on X.
\[Δ\_μ, λ\].interpretation: Measures interaction between local weighted diffusion and curvature deformation.

\[δ^W\_μ, λ\].note: Used to encode μ-dependent curvature identities in IGSOA.
